com.payu.ratel.client.standalone

Class RatelStandaloneFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.payu.ratel.client.standalone.RatelStandaloneFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatelServiceCallPublisher, RatelClientFactory, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware

    public class RatelStandaloneFactory
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware, RatelServiceCallPublisher, RatelClientFactory
    Utility class that enables you to imperatively create ratel service clients. Different factory methods allow you to create clients in various contexts: out of container or within container, with different registry servers.

    • Method Detail

      • fromZookeeperServer

        public static RatelClientFactory fromZookeeperServer(String zookeeperAddress)
        Creates an instance of RatelStandaloneFactory that will use given zookeeper as a service registry.
        Parameters:
        zookeeperAddress - a comma-separated list of zookeeper nodes to communicate to.
        Returns:
        a fully configured RatelStandaloneFactory.

      • fromRatelServer

        public static RatelClientFactory fromRatelServer(String ratelServerAddr)
        Creates an instance of RatelStandaloneFactory that will use given ratel server as a service registry.
        Parameters:
        ratelServerAddr - an url with a ratel registry service. Must contain complete address with path to the registry service (default http:[ratel_server_address]:[port]/server/discovery")
        Returns:
        a fully configured RatelStandaloneFactory.

      • fromZookeeperServer

        public static RatelClientFactory fromZookeeperServer()
        Create a RatelStandaloneFactory with use of zookeeper service given in system properties. Equivalent of fromZookeeperServer(String) but the zookeeper address is read from system property RegistryBeanProviderFactory.SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ZK_HOST. If the property is not present, this method will throw an exception.
        Returns:
        fully configured RatelStandaloneFactory bound to zookeeper service registry.

      • fromRatelServer

        public static RatelClientFactory fromRatelServer()
        Create a RatelStandaloneFactory with use of Ratel service given in system properties. Equivalent of fromRatelServer(String) but the ratel service address is read from system property RegistryBeanProviderFactory.SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ADDRESS. If the property is not present, this method will throw an exception.
        Returns:
        fully configured RatelStandaloneFactory bound to Ratel service registry.

      • fromAnyConfiguration

        public static RatelClientFactory fromAnyConfiguration()
        Creates a RatelStandaloneFactory bound to either zookeeper server or Ratel Server, based on system properties. Exactly one of RegistryBeanProviderFactory.SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ADDRESS and RegistryBeanProviderFactory.SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ZK_HOST must be present in system properties. If RegistryBeanProviderFactory.SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ADDRESS is present, then this method is eqivalent to fromRatelServer(). If RegistryBeanProviderFactory.SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ZK_HOST is present, then this method is eqivalent to fromZookeeperServer() If none of the above is present, then this method will throw an exception.
        Returns:
        Fully configured RatelStandaloneFactory

      • fromBeanFactory

        public static RatelClientFactory fromBeanFactory(org.springframework.beans.factory.config.ConfigurableListableBeanFactory beanFactory)
        Creates a RatelStandaloneFactory on the basis of configuration present in a given beanFactory. If the beanFactory already has Ratel configured, then the result of this method will use exactly the same configuration. If it not present then this method is equivalent of fromAnyConfiguration(), but Environment registered in beanFactory will be used in place of system properties.
        Parameters:
        beanFactory - a beanFactory to use
        Returns:
        fully configured RatelStandaloneFactory

      • getServiceProxy

        public <T> T getServiceProxy(Class<T> serviceContractClass)
        Creates a lazily-initialized fully-featured client of the ratel service with a given contract. Creation of a proxy does not guarantee that such a service exist. A lazy initialization means that the client will try to lookup an address of a service with first call attempt. The client has all client-side features provided by Ratel, such as load-balancing, monitoring, fail-over, etc.
        Specified by:
        getServiceProxy in interface RatelClientFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of the service created should contain contract interface for the service
        Parameters:
        serviceContractClass - the desired contract class.
        Returns:
        a fully-featured service client.

      • setBeanFactory

        public void setBeanFactory(org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactory beanFactory)
                    throws org.springframework.beans.BeansException
        Specified by:
        setBeanFactory in interface org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware
        Throws:
        org.springframework.beans.BeansException
